content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining Station at (-24, -15)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (24.0, -15.0)
- Storage chest at (23.5, -16.5) containing 301 coal

### Iron Ore Processing at (-14, 20)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (-14.0, 23.0) mining iron ore
- Storage chest at (-14.5, 21.5) containing 320 iron ore
- Two stone furnaces at (-11.0, 20.0) and (-9.0, 20.0)

### Copper Ore Processing System at (20, 20)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (20.0, 20.0) mining copper ore
- Storage chest at (20.5, 21.5) containing 366 copper ore
- Stone furnace at (24.0, 20.0)
- Input inserter at (22.5, 20.5) moving ore from chest at (22.5, 21.5) to furnace
- Output inserter at (24.5, 18.5) moving plates from furnace to output chest
- Output storage chest at (24.5, 17.5) containing 53 copper plates
- Additional input chest at (22.5, 21.5) containing 377 copper ore

ERROR TIPS

### Incorrect Inserter Configuration
- The input inserter's pickup/drop positions (21.5, 20.5 -> 23.5, 20.5) don't align with the actual chest position (22.5, 21.5) and furnace position (24.0, 20.0)
- Ensure inserter placement and rotation allows it to properly reach both the source and destination entities

### Resource Management Issues
- Multiple furnaces are idle with "no ingredients to smelt" warnings despite having fuel
- Ensure proper material flow by verifying:
  - Inserter connections between storage and processing buildings
  - Correct orientation of all components
  - Proper spacing between entities

### Fuel Management
- Some mining drills are running out of fuel while others are operational
- Implement consistent refueling system for all burner devices
- Monitor fuel levels in all burner entities to prevent work stoppages
